attributes.action: Rename one of the May bank holidays in honour of our fine NHS.
attributes.additional_details: We are proud as a nation to have a service like the NHS, this would be our way of showing the millions of people that work and serve in the NHS just how proud we are. They’ve never let us down and work so hard to keep us safe and well.
attributes.background: We shan’t the Government to rename one of our May bank holidays in honour of all the great people who work within the great institution that is the NHS.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
